title: French unemployment falls to lowest since 2009
text:
French unemployment falls to lowest since 2009 1:11pm GMT - 01:39 
France's unemployment rate fell below 9 percent for the first time since 2009, registering a sharp drop that is likely to boost President Emmanuel Macron's efforts to reform the country's economy. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
France's unemployment rate fell below 9 percent for the first time since 2009, registering a sharp drop that is likely to boost President Emmanuel Macron's efforts to reform the country's economy.
